page.home.head.title: Bunsi | EN
page.home.head.description: Bunsi is a decentralized social network that rewards users for their contributions.
page.home.title: The smart way to
page.home.subtitle: Vacation
page.home.description1: Fractional ownership is a new, exciting and smart alternative to your vacation rental. Fractional owners buy a share in a residence, in partnership with other owners. Everyone shares the time in the residence, as well as its ongoing costs and expenses.
page.home.description2: In addition, owners can exchange dates on the platform with the BUNSI network of co-owners.
page.home.description3: Currently people who optimize their money and do not want the charges and high costs of a vacation apartment, seek to have flexibility in the use of their property and that is substantially greater than what is normally found with a timeshare, they find that fractional ownership is ideal.
page.home.description4: is a new way of having your apartment on the beach.
page.home.image_description1: QUALITY TIME WITH YOUR LOVED ONES.
page.home.properties.title: Catalog of
page.home.properties.subtitle: properties
page.home.proptech.title: PropTech at your
page.home.proptech.subtitle: service
page.home.proptech.description: From your BUNSI platform you can have control of your property. From expense management, reservation of days that you will vacation to being able to exchange dates with other owners of the BUNSI network.
page.home.proptech.mainmenu.text: Your dashboard will show you all the administrative charges of your property and you can pay them directly from your administrator with your credit/debit card, SPAI Money trasfer in a simple way.
page.home.proptech.calendar.text: You will be able to consult your available weeks, properties for rent or in exchange, and interact with your co-owners and even adjust your annual vacations.
page.home.proptech.support.text: You will have access to reports on the operation and use of the property taking into account the inventory, and even request a super basic welcome.
page.home.proptech.account.text: From your mobile device you can check all the charges of the property, you can pay them directly from your administrator, with your credit / debit card, SPAI, Money transfer, in a simple way. In the same way review the earnings of your property.
page.home.dontmissit.title: Don't miss it
page.home.dontmissit.subtitle: We will open our first 3 properties in a few months, don't miss out and be one of the first to have a BUNSI property and be part of the community.
page.home.dontmissit.description: Fill out the form below so you don't miss out!
page.home.dontmissit.form.name: Name
page.home.dontmissit.form.preferences: What do you prefer from a BUNSI property?
page.home.nft.title: NFT with exclusive benefits
page.home.nft.option1.text: A NFT (Non Fungible Token) is an innovative and so phisticated way of linking the property with the digital world
page.home.nft.option2.text: All owners of a fraction are given a unique NFT that makes them part of the Bunsi Network, a network of owners with exclusive benefits.
page.home.nft.option3.text: Imagine that you have a property in Cancun and by having your NFT you can access golf courses, restaurants, car rentals at a special price.
page.home.nft.option4.text: Belong to the community of Bunsi co-owners. A network of like minded people with similar interests that want to vacation and live smart.
page.home.simulator.title: Calculate the return on your investment in 3 steps
page.home.simulator.contract1: * This is only an informative investment simulator, the amount resulting from it will not generate any obligation on the part of Bunsi, All investments will adhere to the terms and conditions, as well as the corresponding contracts for each trust.
page.home.simulator.contract2: * Remember that this is an estimate, it is subject to terms and conditions.
